message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation rate is higher for me.
Your rate is steep Alice, how about something closer to the middle?
The rate is what it is, Bob. I came down a little, but we need to find an agreement soon!
This is ridiculous Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair offer at this point.
Okay Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll meet you halfway on the last offer, but this has to be it. Time is running out.
